attributes.action: Allow SIPPs to invest in residential property, where the investment is aimed at providing homes for rent by persons not not connected to the SIPP or its member.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the current market this would provide a stimulus to the housing sector, complement the recent announcement to increase council housing stock, provide social housing for those that cannot afford (or choose not to) buy and allow SIPPs an alternative long term investment opportunity.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
